name: ModernDictionary
0:
”Alexa, ask Modern Dictionary to give me a random word.”
”Alexa, ask Modern Dictionary for a random definition.”
”Alexa, open Modern Dictionary.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: modern dictionary
des:
This skill will allow you to ask for the modern definitions of a random word. All definitions are user created and offer an easier to understand definition to different phrases and words. 

Currently, the skill only supports getting random definitions, but specific ones will be implemented later.

Tips: 
- Alexa requires me to censor out explicit words and it is not possible to disable it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
